shortDescription: User Interface (UI) Misrepresentation of Critical Information vulnerability in DocuSign allows Content Spoofing. The SaaS AI assistant ignores hidden content that is rendered after signing, misleading the user. For reference see: CVE-2024-52276 This issue affects DocuSign: through 2024-12-04.
vulnerabilityName: DocuSign SaaS AI Assistant Hidden Content Rendering Vulnerability
required_action: Apply remediations or mitigations per vendor instructions or discontinue use of the product if remediation or mitigations are unavailable.
